org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.distmap

Class ReadsToDistmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.broadinstitute.hellbender.cmdline.CommandLineProgram
      • org.magicdgs.readtools.engine.ReadToolsProgram
        • org.magicdgs.readtools.engine.ReadToolsWalker
          • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.distmap.ReadsToDistmap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.broadinstitute.barclay.argparser.CommandLinePluginProvider

    @DocumentedFeature(extraDocs=StandardizeReads.class)
public final class ReadsToDistmap
extends ReadToolsWalker
    Converts to the Distmap format ( Pandey & Schl√∂tterer 2013) any kind of ReadTools source, including information from the barcodes (BC tag) in the read name (Illumina format) to allow keeping sample data.
